scenes.description: Nanashi Mumei performs her original song 'mumei' on a 3D stage with glowing accents and a large screen behind her.
End credit roll for the 3D graduation stream with instrumental music playing.
A final message from Mumei to her 'Hoomans' (fans) displayed as text on a black screen.

subtitles.original: ...巡り合った 無名の先で 君と出会った
subtitles.english: ...the unknown beyond where we turned, I met you.

subtitles.original: 名前も 顔も わからない君なんだか 懐かしいような気がした
subtitles.english: You, whose name and face I don't know, somehow felt nostalgic.

subtitles.original: 世界に穴を埋めてゆくように ふざけ合って 笑い合って
subtitles.english: As if filling the holes in the world, joking and laughing together.

subtitles.original: 世界 ああああ あのどこかにいる君のため
subtitles.english: World, ahhh, for you who are somewhere out there.

subtitles.original: 今 ああああ 生きているよ 僕ら
subtitles.english: Now, ahhh, we are living.

subtitles.original: 無名のまま
subtitles.english: Still nameless.

subtitles.original: 例えばこれが 映し出された幻でも
subtitles.english: Even if this is an image projected as an illusion.

subtitles.original: 確かに感じる 今君がそこにいること
subtitles.english: I certainly feel that you are there now.

subtitles.original: 名前も 顔も わからない君さよなら してしまえば終わりだ
subtitles.english: You, whose name and face I don't know, if I say goodbye, it's over.

subtitles.original: 君がいなきゃ穴は大きくなる 構わないさ すべて作る
subtitles.english: Without you, the hole gets bigger. I don't mind, I'll make it all.

subtitles.original: 世界 ああああ あのどこかにいる君はどこ
subtitles.english: World, ahhh, where are you, who are somewhere out there?

subtitles.original: 今 ああああ ここにいるよ 私
subtitles.english: Now, ahhh, I am here.

subtitles.original: 無名
subtitles.english: Nameless.

subtitles.original: あたり一面真っ暗な世界 真っ逆さまに落ちてゆく
subtitles.english: A world dark all around, falling headlong.

subtitles.original: 無名だからこの世界には 忘れられて消えちゃうの
subtitles.english: Because I'm nameless, I'll be forgotten and disappear from this world.

subtitles.original: それでも君が求めるのなら この胸にあいた穴に今
subtitles.english: But if you still seek me, into this hole in my heart now...

subtitles.original: 君から私へと風が通り抜け 記憶の振りが今君の元へと行く
subtitles.english: A wind passes from you to me, and a wave of memories goes to you now.

subtitles.original: 世界 ああああ あのどこかにいる君のため
subtitles.english: World, ahhh, for you who are somewhere out there.

subtitles.original: 今 ああああ 生きているよ 私
subtitles.english: Now, ahhh, I am living.

subtitles.original: 無名のまま
subtitles.english: Still nameless.

subtitles.original: Oh hi hoomans! / Hoomansのみなさん、
subtitles.english: Oh hi hoomans! / Everyone, Hoomans,

subtitles.original: Thank you so much for the last three and a half years. / この3年半、最後まで支えてくれて本当にありがとうね。
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for the last three and a half years. / Thank you for supporting me until the end during these three and a half years.

subtitles.original: Even in writing, I know I won't be able to fully convey my feelings. / 文章ではきっと、私の気持ちをすべて伝えきれないと思いますが、
subtitles.english: Even in writing, I know I won't be able to fully convey my feelings. / I'm sure I won't be able to fully express all my feelings in writing, but...
